resources.string: "Welcome to SmolBudget: the budgeting app for those who want to start with small changes. This is the page where you begin a new budget."
You are currently saving $%1$f in your budget. SmolBudget recommends saving at least 20%% of your total income!
Uh oh! It seems the budget you made puts you $%1$f in debt! Please consider re-doing your budget!
Nothing to see here! You either did not save your information or entered all 0s!
